mapper.sql: id, game_name, version, language, download_link, download_page_pass, unbox_pass, create_datetime, download_times, remark, type, extra_info, delete_flag, delete_time
mapper.update: UPDATE game_resource set download_times = download_times+1 WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from game_resource where 'type'=#{type}
AND ( game_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
ORDER BY download_times desc
mapper.insert: insert into game_resource (id, game_name, version, language, download_link, download_page_pass, unbox_pass, create_datetime, download_times, remark, type, extra_info, delete_flag, delete_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadPagePass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unboxPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extraInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
